text.div:
EncounterPatientSearchParameter

Parameter patient:reference

Searches for Encounters by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient={patientUuid}

ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: EncounterPatientSearchParameter
description: Searches for Encounters by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient={patientUuid}
